description: This Java source file defines an abstract class 'BaseEvent' which serves as a base class for all event objects within the system. It includes fields for event identification, code, value, and timestamp, along with JSON serialization/deserialization methods and helper functions for handling service IDs. The class facilitates event management and communication within the architecture, supporting both native and Java producer implementations.

classes.name: BaseEvent
classes.description: An abstract base class for event objects, encapsulating common event properties and JSON serialization/deserialization logic for interoperability between native and Java code.

methods.name: setEventTime
methods.description: Sets the event timestamp using milliseconds.

methods.name: setEventTime
methods.description: Sets the event timestamp using seconds and nanoseconds.

methods.name: setEventTime
methods.description: Sets the event timestamp using a Date object.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object for debugging.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the event object to a JSON object.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Populates the event object from a JSON object.
